title: Light Kit
summary: Wear App: On the go with a Flash Light, Blinker, Morse Code and a Text Board!
description: Light Kit syncs with your smartphone to let you do everything from your smart watch!*To use Light Kit, you need a wearable device.Show your heart to your loverShow text from your phone on your smart watch, instead of talking!Show your friends where you are in a crowd with the blinker or flash lighit!Navigate in the dark with a flashlightEasily use Morse Code, on your watch!Features:Flashlight- Instantly switch between Red, Green, Blue, Yellow, and more.- Easily adjust brightness.Text Board- Choose between displaying words or individual flashing letters.- Edit text quickly and easily from your smartphone. Blinker- Control blinking speedMorse Code (English Only)- Automatically converts text into Morse Code.Light Kit is Yooii Studiosâ€™ first app designed for wearable tech.
descriptionHTML:
Light Kit syncs with your smartphone to let you do everything from your smart watch!
*To use Light Kit, you need a wearable device.

Show your heart to your lover
Show text from your phone on your smart watch, instead of talking!
Show your friends where you are in a crowd with the blinker or flash lighit!
Navigate in the dark with a flashlight
Easily use Morse Code, on your watch!


Features:

Flashlight
- Instantly switch between Red, Green, Blue, Yellow, and more.
- Easily adjust brightness.

Text Board
- Choose between displaying words or individual flashing letters.
- Edit text quickly and easily from your smartphone.

Blinker
- Control blinking speed

Morse Code (English Only)
- Automatically converts text into Morse Code.

Light Kit is Yooii Studios’ first app designed for wearable tech.
comments: doesn't seem to work at all. all I get on the watch is a splash screen and then a blank white screen with a slide-out menu on the right with three items ("color", "blink", and "text") that don't seem to do anything.
Ewww Get rid of that splash screen. And go right to the app on android wear. I don't wanna see the splash screen.
